pages.text: The $(marked)Final Broom$() is the truest of them all.$(br)By combining the four base $(l:bewitchment:tools/brooms)Brooms$() with a $(item)Nether Star$() and the four cardinal elements, one can acquire the fastest broom.$(br)
Other than being fast, this broom will also apply $(marked)Resistance$() to whoever rides it.$(br)$(l:bewitchment:sigils/using_sigils)Sigils$() may also also be applied to it.
